meanings.definition: To drink (a beverage) quickly and in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: She was chugalugging her soda at the party.
meanings.sent2: He always chugalugs his water after a workout.
meanings.sent3: The toddler was chugalugging his milk, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The car engine was chugalugging along the highway.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall chugalugged down the mountainside, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: The act of drinking (a beverage) quickly and in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: Chugalugging is not recommended for enjoying the flavor of a drink.
meanings.sent2: The loud chugalugging of the guests could be heard from the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The chugalugging contest at the fair was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The chugalugging of the river through the valley was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The chugalugging of the train as it passed by was a rhythmic sound in the night.
